title: How to Use Winrar to Fix Corrupted RAR and ZIP Archives

steps.title: Open WinRAR tool on your system.
steps.content: Open WinRAR tool on your system.

steps.title: Go to the file location:
steps.content: Go to the file location: Click on File tab > select Open archive. Or press Ctrl + O buttons.

steps.title: Archive selection:
steps.content: Archive selection: Select the corrupted archive ( RAR or ZIP ) from the system directory.

steps.title: The selected archive will be listed.
steps.content: The selected archive will be listed. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Now click on Tools tab > select Repair archive.
steps.content: Now click on Tools tab > select Repair archive. [2] X Research source Or press Alt + R buttons.

steps.title: Click on Browse button to select a location for new repaired archive.
steps.content: Click on Browse button to select a location for new repaired archive. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Select any location from the system directory.
steps.content: Select any location from the system directory. [4] X Research source

steps.title: Select the Archive type:
steps.content: Select the Archive type: check "Treat the corrupt archive as RAR" or "Treat the corrupt archive as ZIP". [5] X Research source

steps.title: Within a few seconds, the selected archive will be repaired and recreated at the location you have selected earlier.
steps.content: Within a few seconds, the selected archive will be repaired and recreated at the location you have selected earlier. [6] X Research source
